title: Ho’oponopono Book: Healing Your Life With The Ancient Hawaiian Secret Power-Prayer Practice of Love And Forgiveness
description: When you hear the word, “Ho’oponopono,” what is the first thing that comes into your mind? Do you think about a mystical ritual? A far away island you may not have heard about just yet? Or perhaps you think about magic?Ho’oponopono is a Hawaiian word that means, “to make right,” and that is exactly what you will learn how to do with this book. Inside you will be shown how to tap into the power of Ho’oponopono so you can transmute problems through love and forgiveness while realising your Authentic Self, which is directly connected to the Divine source of pure, unconditional love.Here Are Some Of The Ho’oponopono Secrets Revealed In This • Step-by-Step instructions on how to get good results through Ho’oponopono practice• The art of surrendering to Divinity for guidance and inspiration• Increasing your sense of well-being through the law of gratitude• How to persist and benefit from a daily spiritual practice• The importance of total personal responsibility and accountabilityNow you can heal your life, transmute your problems and become a more loving and peaceful person with the simple yet profound practice of Ho’oponopono. Claim your copy now.
author: Colin G. Smith
